EDUCATION.Institute Name: Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines), Dhanbad

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Designed and Implemented the mobile website of the app which enabled multiple teams to play treasure hunt simultaneously.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Implementing data analytics using Hadoop in Bioinformatics
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: In this project we are trying to analyze the different data in the Bioinformatics Databases trying to cluster the similar ones in groups based on the protein sequence.
Designed and implemented the website, which simulates currently on-going NASDAQ and NSE stock markets with virtual money.

Implementing a social network that gives sports fanatics a common platform to exchange views and connect with there favorite player.
Using the follong technologies or tools to build the website or infrastructure :
Node.js, Cassandra, AngularJS, ExpressJs, Cassandra, ElasticSearch, Neo4j, Redis, Git, HTML5, CSS3, nginx, postfix, JWT Authentication, Docker.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Management Information System (MIS) for Indian School Of Mines
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
An information management system that handles information of all faculty, employees, students and alumni of Indian School of Mines. Uses the CodeIgniter MVC framework, with MySQL RDBMS.

Mentor: Dr. Chiranjeev Kumar, Head of Department, Computer Science And Engineering, Indian School of Mines, Dhanbad

My Roles Include:
- Developing the core libraries, workflows and models.
- Developing the user authentication system, and building an authentication library that is used by all modules.
- Developing 4 modules namely Training & Placement, Course Structure, Publication Management & Feedback Management.
- Creating builder tools for managing code and database.
- Setting up and managing development and production servers for the system

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Webmaster at Srijan 2k15 - the cultural fest of Indian School Of Mines
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Developed the website of Srijan'15, Cultural Fest of Indian School Of Mines. Using Creatjs, game engine. The site was fully developed on Canvas.
We had to integrate three Bioinformatics Genome Databases name DDBJ, Genbank and EMBL into one database that had all the attributes from the three databases. This project was implemented in MySQL.
